DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether tropicamide + phenylephrine cyclopentolate + applied for once waiting 30 minutes to retinoscopy (new scheme) is not inferior to apply cyclopentolate alone and wait 45 minutes to retinoscopy (traditional scheme)
DOC.brief_title: A New More Efficient Cycloplegia Scheme
DOC.criteria: Children between 1 and 10 years Strabismus Ocular surgery Another ocular disease than ametropias (i.e uveitis, cataract) Cardiovascular or neurologic disease. Allergy to any of drugs used in the study
